name: Gunnar's Conquest
description: You Play as the main character and travel to different villages and complete different quests while trying to save the king, who has been kidnapped. While your end goal is to arrive to Coast City where you must defeat the boss there and gain access to the castle via a castle entry pass. You will encounter various monsters on the way. You will also experience a in depth story plot as well as buy lots of neat weapons and armor.   This game will also be updated regularly until we feel there is nothing else to add to it.
